decisions.decision: Staking feature will be renamed to voter registration for DAOs that don't distribute tokens
decisions.speaker: Marty
decisions.context: Some DAOs won't distribute tokens to users but still need the staking mechanism for voting
decisions.quote: we're going to actually change the name. Staking is for if the DAO is going to distribute tokens to you. Some DAOs won't do that, but you still need to stake. So we're just going to call this voter registration or something like that.

commitments.commitment: Make DAO configuration updates more user-friendly
commitments.quote: this will be a little bit more user-friendly in the future

commitments.commitment: Improve DAO config display to be more readable for end users
commitments.quote: like I said before, we'll make this look better so that the end user can read it easier

commitments.commitment: Exit beta and fix remaining issues
commitments.quote: Hopefully we'll get out of beta shortly get some of these things fixed

key_facts.fact: Marty has 3.1 million B Paideia tokens

key_facts.speaker: Marty

key_facts.speaker: Marty
